text:
Giuseppe Zamberletti (17 December 1933 – 26 January 2019) was an Italian politician. He was born in Varese, Italy. He was the Minister of Protezione Civile from 1982 to 1987 and Senator from 2004 to 2009.
Zamberletti died on 26 January 2019 in Varese from complications of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 85.
